authentic-image-request.title: Load documents from authentic sources
authentic-image-request.description: Allows requesting an official document from a state authority and share it with a third party.
authentic-image-request.request-success-body: The requested document ('{{name}}') will be retrieved as soon as it is available. You will be informed by e-mail about the further process.
authentic-image-request.available-text: Approve for use at the university
authentic-image-request.request-text: Request and release for use at the university
authentic-image-request.not-available-text: Not available. Please contact the IT support
